title: Battle Before Dawn
opening: Two assassins in the employ of the Black Fang move in. They've been set loose in the palace to murder the crown prince, Zephiel. Eliwood hurries to prevent them from fulfilling their contract.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: The prince's room... Is that the door?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: General Murdock, the prince's bodyguard, should be away. The king concocted some errand to call him from Zephiel's side... There are no guards around. This is an...easy job, isn't it? I... I can do this! This is my first mission, you know? I guess I'm a little nervous, but... I mustn't fail. Mustn't let Mother down.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Are you ready, Jaffar?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: I've...no desire to be a part of your blundering... If you fail, I will, without hesitation, finish the target and then you.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: What!?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Do not be so naive as to expect help from "friends." ...Remember that.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I...I knew that. Don't have to tell me... I'm a member of the Black Fang, after all. Ha ha...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: ...I won't fail. I will become worthy... I will. Mother will be proud of me. She will see the daughter I've become, and she will love me.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: ...There are no guards. It's just like we were told, but...something's strange.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Listen! A voice! Someone's talking in the room!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: No... Someone's praying.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: You're right... It's the prince, isn't it? I wonder what he's praying for.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: I offer this prayer unto thee: My coming-of-age ceremony is tomorrow. As the prince of Bern, I've tried... I've tried my best not to be an embarrassment to my father. I know I've not met with his expectations. But I will try harder. I will please him. I vow to do better. For him.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: ......Hear me: Tomorrow, I will be a man... So this is my last wish as a foolish child. It's the same one I've asked of you every night for all these years, but... Please, bring Father and Mother together again. Please, let the day come when Guinivere and I and her mother... When all of us can live together happily in the castle.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: It's time...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Oh! Jaffar...

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: What!? Villain... ...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: That will leave him unconscious for some time. Now, the time has come for you to do your part...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ...Do it.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I...cannot.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: What!? What did you say?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Listen to him... All he wants is his parents' love... To be accepted... That's all...... He's just like me. No matter how I try, Mother always looks at me as if I were nothing. Her eyes are so filled with disappointment. She's never held me... not even once.......

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Stop this foolishness! I told you! I will not permit you to ruin my opportunity!

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I know... Do as you must, Jaffar. I won't resist. You can do it easily. But...please don't hurt the prince. ...For pity's sake...

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: ...I'm ready to die.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: What?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: We're leaving. Hurry.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ...This is it. Come here.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Bu-But if you do this... Jaffar, you'll...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Don't worry about me. Hurry up. ...No!

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: Hello, Jaffar. Finished already? Such magnificent skill. Is this why they call you the Angel of Death? Sonia told me that you were behaving oddly, but... It appears her fears were groundless.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: I'm sorry! It's not Jaffar's fault! It was me! The prince... I couldn't...

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Nino!

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: What's all this? Why is the girl still alive?

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: What?

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: You received Lady Sonia's orders, did you not? You were to dispose of the worthless little--

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: No!!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Hold your tongue. You will not speak another word.

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: ......So that's how it is? Jaffar, do you plan on betraying Lord Nergal?

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: I will not let Nino die. Get in my way, and I'll kill you.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: Jaffar!

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: Ha ha... So you have some human emotion in you after all. You always seemed just like those creepy morphs. I bet you didn't kill the prince, either. ......Maxime!

intro.speaker: Maxime
intro.line: Yes! I'm here!

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: Take your men and put out all of the lights. Block all the entrances. Your targets are Prince Zephiel and two traitors. Finish this before we draw attention to ourselves. Go!!!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Go now... I will buy you time.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: N-No! You must come, too, Jaffar!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Nino... You must live. You are worthy of living.

intro.speaker: Nino
intro.line: No! Wait! Don't go! Jaffar!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: This is the royal manse.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: The lights have been doused. That's the sound of fighting. What's going on?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: I don't know, but if they're still fighting, we might not be too late! Let's hurry, Eliwood!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: We have to get inside! We have to protect the prince!!

battle.speaker: Harken
battle.line: Are you our tactician, Mark? I am Harken. I beg your forbearance. Lord Eliwood has ordered me to follow your commands in combat. I care not where I meet death. Just guide me wisely.

battle.speaker: Karel
battle.line: Your name is Mark, correct? A tactician? I see. You use wisdom as your blade… Interesting… Mark… I will remember your name.

battle.speaker: Zephiel
battle.line: Ahh... Ow... What's... My room... That man... He's gone. What's going on? Ah! We're under attack! Coming this way... 10...20... I have to get away... No... That's wrong. That's not the way. If I run, they'll simply follow and surround me... Rather than run, I should wait and face them here.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nino
recruit-talk.line: You! Are you from the palace? The prince is in his room! Save him! I’ll take care of anything that happens out here!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Wait, hold on! You’re Nino, right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: I’m not. It’s all true. The Black Fang’s responsible for the death of countless innocents. They’re dancing on strings for Nergal, while he laughs in shadows.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: I know you don’t want to believe all this, but it’s true. Don’t hide yourself from reality. You should come with us. You saved the prince. I think you’ll see what’s right.

recruit-talk.speaker: Nino
recruit-talk.line: You! Are you from the palace? The prince is in his room! Save him! I’ll take care of anything that happens out here!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Wait! You... You’re Nino, aren’t you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I’m sorry... It’s the truth. The Black Fang is no longer the group you thought it was. Nergal is using it to his own ends!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I’m not asking you to believe this all at once. But...it’s the truth. The only truth. Come with us! You’re no assassin... You must know the best thing for you.

battle-talk.speaker: Nino
battle-talk.line: Jaffar!

battle-talk.speaker: Jaffar
battle-talk.line: Nino? ...... I told you to flee.

battle-talk.speaker: Nino
battle-talk.line: No, these people came and helped me! Hurry, Jaffar! Come with me!

battle-talk.speaker: Jaffar
battle-talk.line: Go. There’s no need to save a life without worth.

battle-talk.speaker: Nino
battle-talk.line: Jaffar...

battle-talk.speaker: Jaffar
battle-talk.line: I am a corpse. I have been dead since the day I was born. Leave me...

battle-talk.speaker: Nino
battle-talk.line: No! If you’re not coming, then I’m staying! I do not want you to die, Jaffar!

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: Prince Zephiel?

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: Ah! Who are you?!

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: I’m from Ly... Um... I’m here to rescue you.

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: We’ll drive back the foe. Get back!

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: I will not.

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: Huh?

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: I know neither your name nor your motives. Why should I trust you?

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: Well, I guess you have a point. But...I can’t tell you who we are. We’ve got...reasons.

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: Reasons?

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: Mm. Complicated reasons.

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: ......I see. I place my life in your hands.

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: What? Are you sure?

battle-talk.speaker: Zephiel
battle-talk.line: If you were assassins, I would already be dead. I must trust you.

battle-talk.speaker: Hector
battle-talk.line: You’ve my word of honor!

boss.speaker: Ursula
boss.line: Tell me...are you afraid to die?

boss.speaker: Ursula
boss.line: I cannot understand you. You serve perfection in the form of our masters. Yet you abandon such happiness?

boss.speaker: Jaffar
boss.line: ……I ensure that Nino lives. That’s all.

boss.speaker: Ursula
boss.line: Why won’t you die as Lady Sonia wishes? You, born of garbage. This was your one chance to be useful.

boss.speaker: Nino
boss.line: My mother… She would not say such things. I…don’t believe it.  I don’t believe anything you have to say!

boss.speaker: Ursula
boss.line: Stupid child… I’ll see that you don’t suffer at least.

end.speaker: Zephiel
end.line: Ah! The lights are back. ...The rebels...What's happened? I have to make sure Mother is well! Hello! Is anyone there!?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Jaffar!!

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: Nino...

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: I'm...glad you're well...

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: Why do you not kill me?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: If we did that, Nino might die as well.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: You didn't take the prince's life. So we won't take yours. It's that simple.

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: So naive. Do you know how many of your friends I've killed?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: You monster! I'll--

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Hector!! Calm yourself!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Bah!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Some sins cannot be forgiven, but now... We need all the help we can get to defeat Nergal.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Jaffar... You were planning on throwing your life away, correct? If you've come to regret so many of your past actions, then fight with us.

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: Regret? Such emotions mean nothing...

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Jaffar!

end.speaker: Jaffar
end.line: ......If you want me to...I will...do it.

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Jaffar!!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: That's good, isn't it, Nino?

end.speaker: Nino
end.line: Mm! Thank you! Thank you!!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ah! Hector...

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: Ursula... Beyond hearing so soon?... ......This is quite excellent quintessence. I believe Lord Nergal will be pleased.

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: Ursula...

end.speaker: Ursula
end.line: Limste--my lady Limstella. I am prepared. The only reward for failure is death. However, I must give my report to Lady Sonia...

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: That won't be necessary.

end.speaker: Ursula
end.line: Urrgh!!

end.speaker: Limstella
end.line: This is quite excellent quintessence. I believe Lord Nergal will be pleased.

end.speaker: Murdock
end.line: ...What could His Majesty be thinking? Detaining me for so long, with no just cause! What!? No... It can't be... The prince...

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: Co-Commander! Commander Murdock!! You... You must come...

end.speaker: Murdock
end.line: What's happened!?

end.speaker: Servant
end.line: My apologies for the wait. The queen will see you now.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: Very well.

end.speaker: Louise
end.line: Let us proceed.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: The queen of Bern... Even if it is a private audience, courtly niceties aren't my strong suit.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Mine, either.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Let's go.

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Ah, so you've returned. And you were successful? You recovered the Fire Emblem safely?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Queen Hellene. Has no one told you? Last night in the manse...

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Oh, something about assassins sneaking in, wasn't it? I've no time for such trifles. Quickly, the Emblem.

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Ah... Without a doubt, this is the Fire Emblem. Ha ha! With this, my Zephiel holds rightful claim to the succession! Now, it will never pass to that annoying Guinivere... Ha ha ha.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Queen Hellene...

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Oh, yes. I'd forgotten. Your promised reward. The road to the Shrine of Seals, was it not?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I have a pressing question to ask of you first. What is His Royal Highness Prince Zephiel to you?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: I...beg your pardon?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: HIs Highness Zephiel is your trueborn son, isn't he? Or is he, like the Fire Emblem, nothing more than a tool for securing the throne?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: How dare you! Such insolence! To whom do you think you are speaking!?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: This has nothing to do with title! You are free to possess your desires and aspirations. But your own innocent son... How can you do anything that places His Highness's life at risk!?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: What? What do you mean? Of what do you speak...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Didn't you hear us? Assassins nearly killed--

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Lyndis. That's enough. ...I beg your leave.

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Wait right there! We are not finished! Someone! Someone stop those insolent children! Someone!

end.speaker: Murdock
end.line: My lady Queen.

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Murdock! I thought you'd been summoned to the castle by His Majesty.

end.speaker: Murdock
end.line: That's correct. I've only just returned. One of my men told me all that happened last night. There's something that I must inform you of, Your Majesty.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Well, that's that, huh?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ......Lord Pent, Lady Louise, I ruined a perfectly good opportunity. I'm terribly sorry.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: You said nothing that I did not agree with. Do not think long on it.

end.speaker: Louise
end.line: Lady Hellene has changed. Before she got married, she was a kind woman who wanted to be a good wife and a good mother.

end.speaker: Pent
end.line: She and the king are ill matched. She has suffered much. And now, she is obsessed with the succession. Such a sad life...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: ......His parents are alive. Yet they're both awful. I feel so sorry for him.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Even if it was just, I should have left it unsaid. I angered the queen, and in doing so lost the only aid we had in Bern.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: It's over and done with. No sense worrying about it now. Let's consider our next course of action. Wait, who's there?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Go no farther.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Queen Hellene?!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What are you... Where are your guards?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Your name... It is Eliwood, yes? Take this book and this seal. My reward to you.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Your Majesty?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: This book contains the road to the Shrine of Seals. The seal was a wedding present from Count Reglay from Etruria. I was saving it for Zephiel, but... I believe at this time that you need it more. Furthermore, your path will remain clear for the next three days. No matter what happens during that time, Bern's soldiers will not move. I can make no promises about the king's own troops, though.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: You've done more than enough. You have my heartfelt gratitude. But, Your Majesty...why all of this for us?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: I want to thank you, not as a queen, but as a mother. For saving my son, I am forever in your debt. Now, you should get going.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: ...Queen Hellene.

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Zephiel.

end.speaker: Zephiel
end.line: Mother. Is something amiss?

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: You... You've endured much heartache because of me. ...I'm sorry.

end.speaker: Zephiel
end.line: Th-That's not so!

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: Zephiel... My dear, irreplaceable son. From this day forward... I want us to live together as one loving family. Your father and I...and your sister, Guinivere, too.

end.speaker: Zephiel
end.line: Mother...

end.speaker: Hellene
end.line: I am ashamed of the way I have behaved. The king may not forgive me for the woman I have been. Yet I shall make recompense, no matter the time. I want to change. If I speak to him from the heart, someday, he will understand. After all...we are a family.

end.speaker: Zephiel
end.line: That's right! He will see.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: So the book is a map, but what's this..."seal"?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: This is a...Heaven seal. To receive something so valuable...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: She really listened to you, didn't she? Let's take them and go!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: She listened to us, didn't she?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: That's right. All of us!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I guess...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Let's make for the Shrine of Seals. Once we make it there, something's bound to happen!!
